key: llm_assess:Xi'an Famous Foods 西安名吃 | Financial District:gluten:-5918018350796806790

data.reasoning: Based on the menu data, almost all items appear to contain gluten, specifically hand-ripped noodles and burgers (served on buns). While the OCR included a single instance of 'GLUTEN-FREE', it is difficult to tell what that refers to, as it appears at the beginning of the menu as a header (e.g. from website html). There is no evidence of dedicated gluten-free preparation areas, gluten-free menu options or staff knowledge regarding gluten allergies. The risk of cross-contamination is likely high given the extensive use of wheat-based noodles and buns across the menu.
risk_factors: High probability of gluten contamination due to shared equipment and preparation areas.
Menu heavily features wheat-based noodles and buns.
Lack of identified gluten-free menu items.
No indication of dedicated gluten-free preparation procedures or staff training.
